name: Cryptstalker Handguards
tooltip:
Cryptstalker HandguardsLevel 60

Huntsman Leopold at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Cryptstalker Handguards if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Handguards, 8 Wartorn Chain Scraps, 1 Arcanite Bar and 5 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Handguards
- Wartorn Chain Scrap x 8
- Arcanite Bar
- Cured Rugged Hide x 5
